page.title: 06HOUSING - BREWOOD
page.content:
HOUSING-BREWOOD
Housing in Brewood is different from the housing in the rest of the block. { In Brewood A majority of the houses were detached or semi_detached.There were no terraced houses at all.Most of the houses had a garage.Most had three bedrooms and central heating.A majority of the houses were owner occupied; there were not many privately rented.Most of the have been built on estates during the last 10_30 yrs.Most of the houses had insulation, mainly loft.The houses were built for commuters to live in. SEE PAGE 7 FOR THE REST OF THE HOUSING TOPIC.
